text: I'm disappointed that the Hue bulb in our bathtub reboots randomly. Brian thinks there's a bug in the hub (maybe there's an update with a fix?) but that problem affects my life at vulnerable times of day and I think putting smart lightbulbs in the bathroom is regrettable
I have an issue with bulbs too far from the hub I think? the bathroom stuff needs a switch, wanna get one of the hue dimmers
It fades out to off and on again. It has something to do with it being turned on at the switch we think
Ooh, distance from the hub + walls could totally be a factor
